metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of the check for $500 and stating that a statement has been sent out. While the account is depleted, Stearns will send the $5 requested. Stearns hopes that Luk will return in the fall with every prospect of success.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
